data.text: Our God says, “Encourage my people!
Speak kindly to the people of Jerusalem;
I hear someone who is shouting,
Fill in the valleys;
If you do that, it will become known that Yahweh is glorious/great,
Someone said to me, “Shout!”
Grass withers and flowers dry up
The grass withers and the flowers dry up,
You people of Jerusalem, you have good news to tell to people,
Yahweh your God will be coming with power;
He will take care of his people
There is no one like Yahweh!
And ◄who else can advise Yahweh’s Spirit?/No one else can advise Yahweh’s Spirit!► [RHQ]
◄Has Yahweh consulted anyone else to get advice?/Yahweh has certainly not consulted anyone else to get advice!► [RHQ]
Yahweh considers that the nations are as insignificant as [MET] one drop from a bucket full of water.
There would be not enough wood from all the trees in Lebanon
The nations of the world are completely insignificant/unimportant to him;
So, to whom can you compare God?
Can you compare him to an idol that is made in a mold,
A man who is poor cannot buy silver or gold for his idol;
Have you(pl) not heard this?
God sits on his throne above the earth,
He causes kings to have no more power,
They start to rule, like small plants start to grow and form roots;
The Holy One asks,
Look up toward the sky:
You people of Israel [DOU], why do you complain that Yahweh does not see the troubles that you are experiencing?
Have you never heard
He strengthens [DOU] those who feel weak and tired.
Even youths become faint and weary,
But those who trust in Yahweh will become strong again;
